You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &tau;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Tau;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03a4/index.htm U+003A4].
  * `&tau;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03c4/index.htm U+003C4].
